verses.verse: My <S%H6817>cry<s%> goes to <S%H430>God!<s%> <S%H6963>Indeed,<s%> I cry to <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H6963>help,<s%> and for him to listen to <S%H238>me.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H136>Lord.<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H5064>stretched<s%> out in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H6313>didn't<s%> get tired. My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H5162>comforted.<s%>
I <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and I <S%H1993>groan.<s%> I <S%H7878>complain,<s%> and my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H5848>overwhelmed.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
You <S%H270>hold<s%> my <S%H5869>eyelids<s%> <S%H8109>open.<s%> I am so <S%H6470>troubled<s%> that I <S%H1696>can't<s%> speak.
I have <S%H2803>considered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of ancient <S%H5769>times.<s%>
I <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H5058>song<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%> I <S%H7878>consider<s%> in my own <S%H3824>heart;<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> diligently <S%H2664>inquires:<s%>
"Will the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H2186>reject<s%> us <S%H5769>forever?<s%> <S%H3254>Will<s%> he be favorable no <S%H7521>more?<s%>
Has his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H656>vanished<s%> <S%H5331>forever?<s%> Does his <S%H562>promise<s%> <S%H1584>fail<s%> for <S%H1755>generations?<s%>
Has <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> to be <S%H2589>gracious?<s%> Has <S%H639>he,<s%> in anger, <S%H7092>withheld<s%> his <S%H7356>compassion?<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>thought,<s%> "I will <S%H2470>appeal<s%> to <S%H8141>this:<s%> the years of the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High.<s%>"
I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3050>Yah<s%>'s <S%H4611>deeds;<s%> for I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H6382>wonders<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>
I will also <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on all your <S%H6467>work,<s%> and <S%H7878>consider<s%> your <S%H5949>doings.<s%>
Your <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> is in the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%> What <S%H430>god<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> like <S%H410>God?<s%>
You are the <S%H410>God<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H6382>wonders.<s%> You have made your <S%H5797>strength<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
You have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> with your <S%H2220>arm,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H430>you,<s%> God. The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2342>you,<s%> and they writhed. The <S%H8415>depths<s%> also <S%H7264>convulsed.<s%>
The <S%H5645>clouds<s%> poured <S%H2229>out<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%> The <S%H7834>skies<s%> <S%H5414>resounded<s%> with <S%H6963>thunder.<s%> Your <S%H2687>arrows<s%> also flashed <S%H1980>around.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H7482>thunder<s%> was in the <S%H1534>whirlwind.<s%> The <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> <S%H215>lit<s%> up the <S%H8398>world.<s%> The <S%H8398>earth<s%> <S%H7264>trembled<s%> and <S%H7493>shook.<s%>
Your <S%H1870>way<s%> was through the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> your <S%H7635>paths<s%> through the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%> Your <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> were not <S%H3045>known.<s%>
You <S%H5148>led<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>
